title: Local Hour: Picking On Pickett
description:
The Miami Hurricanes lost to Duke this weekend, and things went predictably terrible on social media for Mike Ryan. Then, after the Dolphins squeaked out a victory over the Steelers we discuss Tua, Mike McDaniel's play-calling, and Kenny Pickett's struggles. Plus, Russell Wilson's PR Machine and who's looked worse between Tom Brady and Aaron Rodgers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
